text: Ta chuangzao nimen [ru a dan], xian yong nitu, ranhou yong yidi jingye [ru chuangzao a dan de houyi], ranhou yong yikuai ningxie [zhu], ranhou shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou shi nimen zhang dao chengnian, ranhou shi nimen bian cheng laoren, jinguan yiqian nimen zhong you yaozhe de, yibian nimen huo dao yige dingqi, yibian nimen mingli.
